//: Base slash attack template, intended as replacement for default bash damage. 4 turn cooldown set arbitrarily, messages should be disabled the more spammable this is. hitsize_min 1 disables eyes and mouth from being targeted (use body_parts for specific targeting !!!). Arbitrary move_cost + damage + armorpen set + mul values set, these should be rechecked depending on the thing that uses the attack
Prioritizes lower limbs > arms + hands, torso and head because the thing using this jumps around
Prioritizes lower limbs > hands > arms > torso, because the thing using this is more or less dog-sized. Should prioritize neck if you're down but how to do that
